name: downy serviceberry tree
description: a small tree with smooth, furrowed gray bark and ovate leaves with pointed tips
details: A small tree grows here.  It has smooth, furrowed gray bark.  The leaves are ovate with pointed tips and finely serrated margins.
keywords: small tree smooth furrowed gray bark ovate leaves pointed tips

Harvestable.preDescription: The tree is covered with small, dark blue berries.
Harvestable.postDescription: The tree has been picked clean of berries.
